newsitem.title: BELGIUM: French ActivCard delivers $1 mln of smart cards.
newsitem.headline: French ActivCard delivers $1 mln of smart cards.

text.p: French "smart card" maker ActivCard, launched on small cap market Easdaq last Friday, said it had already confirmed the delivery of over 40,000 or $1.0 million worth of cards to new banking group customers this quarter.

In a statement received on Monday in Brussels, where Easdaq is based, the company also said it had signed "major contracts with several banking groups" on Friday, including Swedish bank Ostgota Enskilda Bank.
ActivCard will supply the banks with its personal authentication cards for the launch of their secure remote banking services.
These services would allow the payment of invoices to third parties, transfers to other national bank accounts and access to transaction histories, the statement added.
